snippet: The people behind “The Straits,” a 10-episode Australian series receiving its premiere at Hulu.com, are clearly great admirers of “The Sopranos” and “The Godfather.”
abstract: Mike Hale notes that Australian television series The Straits, which is premiering online at Hulu.com, is heavily influenced by HBO Mafia tale The Sopranos.
lead_paragraph: The people behind “The Straits,” a 10-episode Australian series receiving its premiere at Hulu.com, are clearly great admirers of “The Sopranos” and “The Godfather.”

headline.seo: ‘The Straits,’ an Australian Series at Hulu.com
